quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Domino and Type
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, domino, making. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What type of seafood is put in the center of the traditional Japanese dumplings called Takoyaki?
Which of these is not among the traditional ingredients used for the making of the Japanese dish Nikujaga?
What type of domino game is Bergen?

options.text: Both blocking and scoring domino game
Neither blocking nor scoring domino game

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scoring domino game

questions.question: What kind of meal is the traditional Japanese dish called Zoni?
In the domino game Chicken Foot, which of the following is true about doubles?

options.text: Doubles cannot be used as spinners.
When used as a spinner all sides of the double must be occupied before players can play anywhere else.
Players double their score when they put a double.
Players are only allowed to add tiles to a certain branch.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: When used as a spinner all sides of the double must be occupied before players can play anywhere else.

questions.question: What type of meat is used for the preparation of the traditional Japanese meal Soki?
How is the popular Japanese meal Karaage prepared?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: By deep frying

questions.question: The largest commonly available domino set is the Double Twelve consisting of 91 tiles.
Which of these is not one of the colloquial nicknames of the pieces of the domino set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They all are

questions.question: Of how many pieces does the traditional Sino-European domino set consist?
What type of meat is used for the preparation of Basashi, a popular Japanese dish?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Horse meat

questions.question: In what shape is the Japanese cake called Taiyaki traditionally made?
Which of these is a traditional Japanese low-alcoholic sweet drink?
In domino, what does the term downing mean?

options.text: Putting the last tile of the game
Putting the first tile of the game

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Putting the first tile of the game

questions.question: In blocking domino games when does the scoring of the game happen?

options.text: At the beginning of the game
In the middle of the game
At the end of the game

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: At the end of the game

quizzes.title: History Quiz: Domino and Meaning
quizzes.description: Test your history knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering History, domino, application. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What physical reaction is pepper believed to stimulate?
What is the meaning of the Spanish word vainilla, from which the name of the spice vanilla originated?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Little pod

questions.question: The modern game of chess originated from this Indian game of strategy.
What herb is known as Laotian coriander and Lao cilantro in Thailand and Vietnam?
Garlic worsens which of these medical conditions?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stomach ulcer

questions.question: What is the meaning of the name of the popular spice saffron, which has an Arabic origin?
What is the Japanese version of chess known as?
The domino effect, a term named after the domino game, denotes what peculiar sequence of events?

options.text: Simultaneous events caused by a small event
One big event causing a series of simultaneous small events

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Consecutive events triggering one another

questions.question: Paprika, and chili peppers in general, are very high in this essential vitamin.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vitamin C

questions.question: Mustard seeds are especially high in this mineral.
The consumption of ginger is contraindicated in cases of this medical condition.
What unusual application does ground nutmeg have in India?

options.text: It is used as a fertilized for pot plants.
It is used to make dyes.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is smoked.

questions.question: Cinnamon is believed to have a beneficial effect in the treatment of which of the following conditions?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: 42 is a domino game popular in which part of the world?
Where was a depiction of a domino tile included in 2008?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In Unicode

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Chess and Meal
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, making, cartoon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What type of meal is the Native American dish called Alegria?
What is the meaning of the word taco, denoting a traditional Native American meal?
What is the Native American drink called Asi associated with in the Native American tradition?
What is the Burmese variation of chess known as?
The piece known as the rukh is found in this variation of chess.
What is the Native American sauce Mole de Cacahuate, or Peanut Mole, traditionally served with?
What vegetables are used for the making of the traditional Native American meal called Llapingacho?
What type of meat is used for the preparation of the traditional Native American soup called Pira caldo?
Capturing the opponents flag is the means of winning in this version of chess.
What is the literal translation of the Quechua word pachamanca, which refers to a traditional Native American dish?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Earthen pot

questions.question: The piece known as the noyon is found in this version of chess.
The leopard, lion and the tiger appear in this variation of chess.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dou Shou Qi

questions.question: What kind of drink is the traditional Native American beverage called Champurrado?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chocolate drink

questions.question: What type of meal is the bammy, which originates from Jamaica?
What Warner Bros. cartoon character uses the name of the Native American meal succotash as a catchphrase?

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Consumption and Fruit
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, fruits, watermelon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the treatment of what disease are the leaves and bark of the guava used?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What effect does the consumption of figs produce on the human body?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It has a laxative effect.

questions.question: What part of the grape plant contains the lowest amount of antioxidants?
What vitamin are lychee fruits rich in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vitamin C

questions.question: On what continent is the watermelon plant believed to have originated?
Why was the passion fruit given this interesting name?

options.text: Because it was considered an aphrodisiac.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It has a religious connotation.

questions.question: The mango fruit is the national fruit of this country.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: The consumption of raw pineapple is contraindicated for people who suffer from this disease.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Liver disease

questions.question: What is the common name of the fruit Persea Americana, which is native to the Caribbean, Mexico, South America and Central America?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What country is the largest producer of strawberries in the world according to 2007 data?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the USA

questions.question: Which of these is not a variety of the lemon tree?
The consumption of blood oranges prevents this medical problem.
The ripe fruits of raspberry culitvars come in all of these colors except which one?
Which of these statements is not true about pears?

options.text: They are rich in vitamin A.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They promote allergic reactions.

questions.question: Why shouldnt blackberries be picked after September 29 according to a popular superstition in the United Kingdom?

options.text: A woman who consumes them after this date will never get pregnant.
They belong to the devil from this day on.
The one who eats them will grow hairs on their back.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They belong to the devil from this day on.

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Type and Preparation
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, condition, people. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What type of alcoholic beverage is the traditional Thai drink Sang Som?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grape vine

questions.question: What is the literal translation of the expression Kai yat sai, denoting a Thai omelette?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stuffed eggs

questions.question: What method of cooking is used in the preparation of the traditional Thai dish called Nuea pad prik?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stir frying

questions.question: What is the popular Thai hot sauce Sriracha named after?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A town

questions.question: The Thai dish Khanom bueang is known under this name in the English-speaking world.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Crispy pancakes

questions.question: What type of drink is the traditional Thai drink Kokkoh?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rice milk

questions.question: What essential nutrient do tangerines contain?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: People having this type of allergy may have allergic reaction to bananas.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Latex allergy

questions.question: What medical condition do prunes and prune juice relieve?
The traditional Thai tea, called cha-yen in Thailand, is made from this type of tea.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Black tea

questions.question: Which grapefruit variety contains the powerful antioxidant lycopene?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Red grapefruit

questions.question: What is the literal meaning of the name of the dish Pad see ew, very popular in Thailand and Laos?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fried with soy sauce

questions.question: What unripened fruit is used for the preparation of the spicy Thai salad Som tam?
What type of meat is used for the preparation of the popular Thai soup called Tom yum?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

The traditional Arab cookies, called Kleicha, are considered the national cookies of this Arab country.
What is the meaning if the word kibbeh which refers to a popular dish in the Arab world and in Brazil?
What kind of dish is the popular South African meal called Melktert?
What type of meat is used for the preparation of the popular Arab meal called Shish taouk?
What type of alcoholic beverage is the popular South African drink Umqombothi?

The Arabian dish Manakish is very similar to this very popular Italian food.
